com.m3rcuriel.controve.components

Interface Relay


  • public interface Relay
    An abstract representation of any object which can switch between on and off.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  Relay.State
      The set of states possible in a Relay.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Relay instantaneous(java.util.function.Consumer<java.lang.Boolean> switcher, java.util.function.BooleanSupplier onState)
      Construct a new Relay which switching instantaneously from on to off.
      default boolean isOff()
      Check if the Relay is Relay.State.OFF.
      default boolean isOn()
      Check if the Relay is Relay.State.ON.
      default boolean isSwitchingOff()
      Check if the Relay is Relay.State.SWITCHING_OFF.
      default boolean isSwitchingOn()
      Check if the Relay is Relay.State.SWITCHING_ON.
      Relay off()
      Switch the Relay off.
      Relay on()
      Switch the Relay on.
      Relay.State state()
      Retrieve the Relay.State of the Relay.

        Switch the Relay on.

        Switch the Relay off.
        Returns:
        this Relay for method chaining

        default boolean isOn()
        Check if the Relay is Relay.State.ON.
        Returns:
        true if the Relay is on

      • isOff

        default boolean isOff()
        Check if the Relay is Relay.State.OFF.
        Returns:
        true if the Relay is off

      • isSwitchingOn

        default boolean isSwitchingOn()
        Check if the Relay is Relay.State.SWITCHING_ON.
        Returns:
        true if the Relay is switching on

      • isSwitchingOff

        default boolean isSwitchingOff()
        Check if the Relay is Relay.State.SWITCHING_OFF.
        Returns:
        true if the Relay is switching off

      • instantaneous

        static Relay instantaneous(java.util.function.Consumer<java.lang.Boolean> switcher,
                           java.util.function.BooleanSupplier onState)
        Construct a new Relay which switching instantaneously from on to off.
        Parameters:
        switcher - a Consumer to switch the Relay
        onState - the method to read the state
        Returns:
        the constructed Relay
